Name: Hospital Bed Rail with Entrapment Risk
Complaint_Text: Gap between rail and mattress, patients getting limbs caught, rail collapsing unexpectedly, poor locking mechanism, entrapment hazard warnings from nursing homes
B2B_Feedback: Multiple skilled nursing facilities reporting entrapment incidents. Two serious injuries (fractures). Requesting redesign of gap spacing per FDA guidelines. Cannot purchase more until resolved.
Amazon_Feedback: Not sold on Amazon - B2B only
Manual_Context: REGULATORY ALERT - Does not meet FDA Hospital Bed Safety Standards (21 CFR 880.5120). Gap exceeds 4.5 inch limit. Recall pending. Legal review in progress. Estimated liability $125000+
